channel.title: ipo on SEO with Charan.com
channel.description: Recent content in ipo on SEO with Charan.com

item.title: How are shares alloted in an IPO?
item.description: How is an IPO alloted to people? Is it luck? Lottery? What are the different type of people who apply in an IPO? How to maximize my chance to get a allotment?

item.title: How to maximize chance of allotment in IPO?
item.description: Learn how to maximize the chance of getting an IPO alloted by learning this little trick, and also read some FAQ and myths on it!

item.title: What is an IPO?
item.description: A beginner’s guide to all about what an IPO is, why are they issued, and why is there always a buzz around it

item.title: What is the Grey Market & Grey Market Premium?
item.description: Want to know how people predict the listing prices of IPOs? Want what does the term Grey Market Premium mean and why is it important?

item.title: How does a company Offer an IPO?
item.description: Learn all the things that go behind the curtains when a company files to go public and all the technical steps involved in it.

item.title: How to check allotment in IPO?
item.description: Learn how and where to check if you have gotten allotment of the IPO which you bid for.
